Restricted  
NO.CAS-7(9)/2008/DIV.I(Weapon) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
 
Dated :   25 /01/2011 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO.  04 / 2011 
 
 
Subject:   Permission for Carriage of Arms & Ammunition by the   
                 General Manager, Gun & Shell Factory. 
 
 
 
 
A copy of DGCA permit  number 933-AA/2010, issued under 
reference  No.8/14/2009-IR, dated 30.11.2009,  regarding authorization to the 
General Manager, Gun & Shell Factory, Cossipore, Kolkata for carriage of arms 
& ammunition, consigned to the licensed dealers and Central / State Govt. 
Departments by air to/from any point within India, is forwarded herewith for 
information and necessary action by all concerned.  This supersedes BCAS 
Circular No.05/2010 dated 03/02/2010.  
 
2. 
Unless suspended or revoked earlier, this permit shall remain valid 
till 31.12.2011  from the date of issue.  
 
 
   This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security(CA).  
 
Encl:    As above.  
 
 
 
( R.N.Dhoke, IPS )  
Addl.Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution as per list attached.
